Package pamViewFX.symbol

Class StandardSymbolModifierPane

java.lang.Object
javafx.scene.Node
javafx.scene.Parent

pamViewFX.symbol.SymbolModifierPane
pamViewFX.symbol.StandardSymbolModifierPane
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.css.Styleable, javafx.event.EventTarget, DynamicSettings
Direct Known Subclasses:
DLSymbolOptionPane, PeakFreqOptionsPane
public class StandardSymbolModifierPane extends SymbolModifierPane
A symbol modifier pane that allows users to select a colour for symbol, symbol line and symbol shape.
Author:
Jamie Macaulay.

  • Constructor Details

    • StandardSymbolModifierPane

      public StandardSymbolModifierPane(SymbolModifier symbolModifer)
      Create a default set of check boxes that allow the user to select how they wish to alter t
      Parameters:
      symbolModifer - - the symbol modifier.

    • StandardSymbolModifierPane

      public StandardSymbolModifierPane(SymbolModifier symbolModifer, javafx.geometry.Orientation orientation, boolean checkBox, int selectable)
      Create a standard symbol modifier pane. This shows the modifiable options such as fill, line, symbol and can also show user selectable options for each mod e.g. a colour selector for fill.
      Parameters:
      symbolModifer - - the symbol modifier
      orientation - - the orientation - VERTICAL or HORIZONTAL layout.
      checkBox - - true to show check boxes for each selectable option.
      selectable - - a bitmap of mod options in which to allow the user to manually select the colour/symbol etc. Set to zero for only check boxes.

  • Method Details

    • isUseCheckBox

      public boolean isUseCheckBox()
      Check whether check boxes have been shown. If not then it is assumed all mod options have been set to true.
      Returns:
      true of user selectable check boxes are shown

    • getParams

      public StandardSymbolOptions getParams()
      Description copied from class: SymbolModifierPane
      Get the parameter for a symbol modifier.
      Overrides:
      getParams in class SymbolModifierPane
      Returns:
      reference to the same symbol modifier but with params now changed.

    • createSymbolPane

      public javafx.scene.layout.Pane createSymbolPane(SymbolModifier symbolmodifier, javafx.geometry.Orientation orientaiton, boolean checkBox, int userSelectable)
      Create the pane for the symbol manager.
      Parameters:
      orientaiton - - the orientation of the pane.
      checkBox - - the selectable check box.
      selectable - - a bitmap of the symbol types that can be user selectable (0 for not user selectabnle)
      Returns:
      the pane.

      Returns:

    • setDefaultFillOpacity

      public void setDefaultFillOpacity(double opacity)
      Set the default opacity for selected colours from the colour picker. The default opacity is the the opacity when a user selects a new colour. The user can alter this with advanced colour controls.
      Parameters:
      opacity - - the default opacity for fill colours.
